mapper.select: SELECT TR_BOARD_NO, TR_BOARD_TITLE, TR_BOARD_CONTENT, TR_BOARD_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, LOCAL_NAME FROM (SELECT TR_BOARD_NO, TR_BOARD_TITLE, TR_BOARD_CONTENT, TR_BOARD_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, LOCAL_NAME FROM TR_BOARD ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT PLANNER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, PLANNER_TITLE, F_DATE, L_DATE, W_DATE, AREA, TYPE, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, P.STATUS FROM( SELECT PLANNER_NO, PLANNER_WRITER, PLANNER_TITLE, F_DATE, L_DATE, W_DATE, AREA, TYPE, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, STATUS FROM PLANNER ORDER BY COUNT DESC) P JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_ID = PLANNER_WRITER) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
